description:
testing: document that example output must use line comments

Fixes issue 4812.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM, for the first change.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7396051/diff/3002/src/pkg/testing/testing.go
File src/pkg/testing/testing.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7396051/diff/3002/src/pkg/testing/testing.go#newcode70
src/pkg/testing/testing.go:70: // Example functions without output line comments are compiled but not executed.
revert
